Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
BotPlayer, HumanPlayer
public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains information about a player. It is abstract as both bots and humans are types of players and so they inherit from player

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int lookRange
    Integer representing the size of the cropped map that each player should get
    protected Coordinate playerCoords
    Coordinate which represents the player's position on the map
    protected java.util.ArrayList<Command> validCommandsArray
    ArrayList of commands which stores the valid commands the player accepts

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Player​(Coordinate playerCoords, java.util.ArrayList<Command> validCommandsArray)
    The constructor initialises a player with the coordinate they are in and the array of commands that they accept

    Abstract method which will return the player's character

    Getter which returns the player's current coordinates

    Abstract method which will represent whether each player is human or not

      Integer representing the size of the cropped map that each player should get

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(Coordinate playerCoords, java.util.ArrayList<Command> validCommandsArray)
      The constructor initialises a player with the coordinate they are in and the array of commands that they accept
      Parameters:
      playerCoords - Coordinate which represents the player's coordinate
      validCommandsArray - ArrayList of Commands which contains the commands this player accepts

  • Method Details

    • nextAction

      public abstract java.util.List<java.lang.String> nextAction()
      Abstract method which will be the action a player should take at their turn.
      Returns:
      List of strings which contains the command name and its arguments that the player made.

    • handleCommandCallback

      public abstract void handleCommandCallback​(java.lang.String commandName, java.lang.String returnVal)
      Abstract method which will be the way each player deals with the return value that their action called
      Parameters:
      commandName - String containing the command name the player made
      returnVal - String containing the return value of the command the player has called

    • isHuman

      public abstract boolean isHuman()
      Abstract method which will represent whether each player is human or not
      Returns:
      boolean representing whether the player is human or not

    • getPlayerChar

      public abstract char getPlayerChar()
      Abstract method which will return the player's character
      Returns:
      character representing the player's character.

    • getPlayerCoords

      public Coordinate getPlayerCoords()
      Getter which returns the player's current coordinates
      Returns:
      Coordinate representing the player's coordinates on the map

    • setPlayerCoords

      public void setPlayerCoords​(Coordinate playerCoords)
      Setter which sets the player's current coordinates
      Parameters:
      playerCoords - Coordinate representing the coordinates which need to be stored as the new player's coordinates
